org.w3c.tools.resources.event
Interface StructureChangedListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContainer, AuthRealm, AutoLookupDirectory, ConfigResource, ContainerResource, ControlResource, CvsEntryResource, CvsRootDirectory, CvsRootPassDirectory, DirectoryResource, DirectoryResource, ExternalContainer, HttpDirectoryResource, HttpPassDirectory, IndexersCatalog, JigsawServletContext, PassDirectory, PassDirectory, RealmsCatalog, ResourceEventMulticaster, StructureChangedAdapter, TemplateContainer, ToolsListerFrame, VirtualHostResource, WebDAVDirectoryResource, ZipDirectoryResource
public interface StructureChangedListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Method Summary
 void resourceCreated(StructureChangedEvent evt)
          A new resource has been created in some space.
 void resourceModified(StructureChangedEvent evt)
          This handles the RESOURCE_MODIFIED kind of events.
 void resourceRemoved(StructureChangedEvent evt)
          A resource is about to be removed This handles the RESOURCE_REMOVED kind of events.
 void resourceUnloaded(StructureChangedEvent evt)
          A resource is about to be unloaded This handles the RESOURCE_UNLOADED kind of events.

resourceCreated

void resourceCreated(StructureChangedEvent evt)
A new resource has been created in some space. This handles the RESOURCE_CREATED kind of events.

Parameters:
evt - The event describing the change.

resourceRemoved

A resource is about to be removed This handles the RESOURCE_REMOVED kind of events.

Parameters:
evt - The event describing the change.

resourceUnloaded

void resourceUnloaded(StructureChangedEvent evt)
A resource is about to be unloaded This handles the RESOURCE_UNLOADED kind of events.

Parameters:
evt - The event describing the change.
